CivicTwitter 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

check_rate_limit()

Check Rate Limit Status and Sleep If Need Be

get_following()

Helper function for get_user_following

get_timeline()

Helper function for get_user_timeline

get_user_by_id()

Get details about a specified user by user_id see https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/users/lookup/api-reference/get-users-id

get_user_by_username()

Get details about a specified user by username see https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/twitter-api/users/lookup/api-reference/get-users-id

get_user_following()

Get list of accounts following a user

get_user_timeline()

Get user timeline tweets

json_following_to_df()

Turn JSON list of users into a tidy dataframe

json_tweets_to_df()

Turn JSON list of tweets into a tidy dataframe

json_user_to_df()

Turn JSON object for single users into a tidy dataframe

rate_limits()

Get API Rate Limit Statuses

set_bearer_token()

Set the bearer token for API authentication
